Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the heart of the central trading district in the center of the town. Hillcrest Way runs east and west through the intersection and Lankshire Parkway runs north and south. There are two large complexes on the northeast and southeast corners of the intersection, and a couple of smaller shops on the northwest and southwest corners.
